text: @LindseyGrahamSC And you lie for @realDonaldTrump about #COVID19 and bounties on Americans...among other things. You have helped kill 128,500 people and at least 20 military people. THAT IS WHAT IS RICH! You are killing your character for a sociopathic narcissist.
